Name: Cube Shifter
About the game: You are the cube! You must move left and right to dodge obstacles that you are moving towards. You can enter level mode and attempt to beat them all or you can enter score mode and test yourself to get the highest score. Collect coins that appear on the ground or beat the levels to earn coins, the more difficult the level, the more coins up for grabs. Spend your coins to purchase upgrades that you can use in game, buy new skins for your cube or buy different backgrounds. Use 'A' to go left and 'D' to go right.
Meta Title: Cube Shifter: Aug 14, 2020, Ben Phillips and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cube Shifter? Check out the release date (Aug 14, 2020), developer insights from Ben Phillips, and a complete game summary.
